alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Yuma County through 215 PM MST... At 130 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Tacna, or 30 miles east of Fortuna Foothills. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wellton, Tacna and Mohawk. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 31 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County
